name: Geekbench: HDR
description: Blends six 16MP SDR photos to create a single HDR photo, using a recovery process and radiance map construction (Debevec and Malik 1997), and a tone mapping algorithm (Reinhard and Devlin 2005).The score is calibrated against a baseline score of 2,500 (Dell Precision 3460 with a Core i7-12700 processor) as per the Geekbench 6 Benchmark Internals.
